titleStmt.title: Seasonable memento's, and sober advice: the former in a very concise narrative of eight yeares marvellous mercifull providences, and mans ungratefull return. The latter in XVIII. additionall expedients. Humbly tendred to the view of all, partakers in the mercies, and parties in the delinquency, but especially to the great sticklers in the two grand divisions of the Presbyterian and Dissenting parties.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
